robotkaposzta_browser2.name: Browser
robotkaposzta_browser2.description: Extends the navigation and document functionality of the built-in Browser plugin

log.description: Log a message to the browser console, which can be useful for debugging.

type.name: Type
type.desc: Choose the type of message to log to the browser console.

message.name: Message
message.desc: Enter the message text to log to the browser console. You can format with "%c" chars e.g. "%cRed %cGreen".

style.name: Style
style.desc: Set CSS styles on the console message e.g. "['background-color:white;color:red;', 'background-color:black;color:green;']"

count.description: Counting and write it to the browser console, which can be useful for debugging.

label.name: Name
label.desc: Enter a name to identify the counting.

count-reset.description: Reset the counting and write it to the browser console, which can be useful for debugging.

label.name: Name
label.desc: Enter a name to identify the counting.

time-start.description: Start a timer, which can be useful for debugging.

label.name: Name
label.desc: Enter a name to identify the timer.

time-log.description: Write a specific timer's time to the browser console, which can be useful for debugging.

label.name: Name
label.desc: Enter a name to identify the timer.

time-end.description: Stops specific timer's time and write to the browser console, which can be useful for debugging.

label.name: Name
label.desc: Enter a name to identify the timer.

table.description: Format a JSON data to a table and write it to the browser console, which can be useful for debugging.

start-group.description: Start a message group in the browser console.

label.name: Name
label.desc: Enter the group name to add to the browser console.

collapsed.name: Format
collapsed.desc: How to collapse the group in the browser console

end-group.description: End a message group in the browser console.

vibrate.description: Vibrate with a specified pattern if the device (e.g. phone) supports it.

pattern.name: Pattern
pattern.desc: A comma-separated string with a list of times in milliseconds, describing a pattern of vibrations and pauses.

set-theme-color.description: Set browser's theme color. (work in android)

color.name: Color
color.desc: The new theme color in hex. e.g. #112233

set-close-prevent.description: Set that the browser prevent the user to close the window.

is-prevent.name: Is prevent
is-prevent.desc: Whether to enable or disable the window close prevention.

load-stylesheet.description: Load a Cascading Style Sheet (CSS) from a URL and apply it to the document.

url.name: URL
url.desc: URL to load CSS from. This can be a project file URL, e.g. "mystyle.css".

unload-stylesheet.description: Unload a Cascading Style Sheet (CSS) from a URL and remove it from the document.

url.name: URL
url.desc: URL to unload CSS from. This can be a project file URL, e.g. "mystyle.css".

exec-js.description: Execute a string of javascript in the browser. Use with care!

context.name: Context
context.desc: Which context use when execute javascript.

javascript.name: Javascript
javascript.desc: String of javascript code to execute. Beware of causing security vulnerabilities or causing errors that break the game! Refer to the documentation for more advice. Wherever possible, prefer to use Construct 3's Javascript SDK instead.

go.description: Navigate through the browser window's history.

direction.name: Direction
direction.desc: Direction where you want to navigate in browser history.

amount.name: Amount
amount.desc: Navigation amount how much you want to navigate in browser history.

push-url.description: Add an entry to the browser's session history stack without reload. Note: Only edit the subadress and it will delete the all history after it.

url.name: URL
url.desc: URL that push to the browser's session history stack.

replace-url.description: Replace the current history session wihout reload. Note: Only edit the subadress.

url.name: URL
url.desc: URL that replace the current URL.

url.name: URL
url.desc: Enter the full URL to navigate to.

target.name: Target
target.desc: Which frame level to navigate. Only has an effect when using frames in a web browser.

name.name: Tag
name.desc: A string to identify this window. You can reuse an existing window by reusing its tag.

set-scroll-restoration.description: Set the history session's scroll restoration to automatic or manual.

mode.name: Mode
mode.desc: Which scroll restoration apply to the current history session.

close.description: Close the current browser window or tab. The browser may prompt the user to confirm.

target.name: Target
target.desc: Which frame level to navigate. Only has an effect when using frames in a web browser.

name.name: Tag
name.desc: A string to identify this window. You can reuse an existing window by reusing its tag.

reload.description: Reload the current page. Also updates if an 'On update ready' event has triggered.

focus.description: Focus the current browser window or tab.

target.name: Target
target.desc: Which frame level to navigate. Only has an effect when using frames in a web browser.

name.name: Tag
name.desc: A string to identify this window. You can reuse an existing window by reusing its tag.

blur.description: Blur (unfocus) the current browser window or tab.

target.name: Target
target.desc: Which frame level to navigate. Only has an effect when using frames in a web browser.

name.name: Tag
name.desc: A string to identify this window. You can reuse an existing window by reusing its tag.

request-fullscreen.description: Request the user to enter fullscreen mode. Usually this only works in a user input trigger.

mode.name: Mode
mode.desc: Determine how the game viewport is displayed in the monitor area.

navigation-ui.name: Message
navigation-ui.desc: Enter the message to display in the prompt.

lock-orientation.description: Prevent the orientation of the device changing.

orientation.name: Orientation
orientation.desc: The orientation to lock the device to. This may only take effect if already in fullscreen mode.

unlock-orientation.description: Restore normal device orientation after locking.

on-back.description: Triggered when device 'Back' button is pressed.  Note not all devices have a 'Back' button.

on-online.description: Triggered when user is offline and a connection becomes available.

on-offline.description: Triggered when user is online and a connection becomes unavailable.

is-online.description: True if device is online and a connection is available.

is-browser-type.description: True if detected browser is the selected version.

type.name: Type
type.desc: Select the browser type to test.

on-offline-ready.description: Triggers on the first run when finished saving resources for offline support.

on-update-found.description: Triggers upon starting to download an update in the background.

on-update-ready.description: Triggers when an update has finished downloading in the background.

on-color-scheme-change.description: Triggered when the color scheme is changed.

is-color-scheme.description: True if a color scheme is match the selected parameter.

on-close-prevent.description: Triggered when the closing is prevented.

is-close-prevent.description: True if the project will notify the user on window close.

on-exec-js.description: Triggered when the javascript code execute finished.

on-navigation.description: Triggered when user navigate in history session.

scrollrestoration.name: Scroll restoration
scrollrestoration.desc: Select the scroll restoration to test.

is-url.description: True if the URL is in valid format.

on-resize.description: Triggered when the current browser viewport is resized.

is-fullscreen.description: True if the page is currently in fullscreen mode.

is-portraitlandscape.description: Check the current orientation of the device.

get-platform.description: Get the browser platform (e.g. Windows, Mac).

get-user-agent.description: Get the full browser user agent string.

get-theme-color.description: Get the page's theme color in hexadecimal format. e.g #0189ef

exec-js-result.description: In 'On execute javascript' trigger get the string of the javascript code result that run. Wherever possible, prefer to use Construct 3's Javascript SDK instead.

history-length.description: Get the history stack's current lenght.

url-href.description: Get the current page's full URL.

url-hash.description: Get or set the URL's hash (https://example.com/en-US/href#Examples => #Examples). UrlHash(url(optional), replace(optional))

url-host.description: Get or set the URL's host (https://example.com:443/en-US/href#Examples => example.com:443). UrlHost(url(optional), replace(optional))

url-hostname.description: Get or set the URL's hostname (https://example.com:443/en-US/href#Examples => example.com). UrlHostname(url(optional), replace(optional))

url-username.description: Get or set the URL's protocol (https://anonymous:flabada@example.com:443/en-US/href#Examples => anonymous). UrlUsername(url(optional), replace(optional))

url-password.description: Get or set the URL's password (https://anonymous:flabada@example.com:443/en-US/href#Examples => flabada). UrlPassword(url(optional), replace(optional))

url-pathname.description: Get or set the URL's pathname (https://anonymous:flabada@example.com:443/en-US/href#Examples => /en-US/href). UrlPathname(url(optional), replace(optional))

url-port.description: Get or set the URL's port (https://anonymous:flabada@example.com:443/en-US/href#Examples => 443). UrlPort(url(optional), replace(optional))

url-protocol.description: Get or set the URL's protocol (https://anonymous:flabada@example.com:443/en-US/href#Examples => https:). UrlProtocol(url(optional), replace(optional))

url-search.description: Get or set the URL's search query (https://anonymous:flabada@example.com:443/en-US/href?q=123&s=23' => ?q=123&s=23). UrlSearch(url(optional), replace(optional))

url-search-count.description: Get the URL's search query keys count. UrlSearchCount(url(optional))

url-search-param-at.description: Get the URL's search query key name at an index. UrlSearchParamKeyAt(url(optional), index)

url.name: Url
url.desc: URL to use or empty string to use page's URL.

at.name: At
at.desc: 0-based index to get search query key.

url-search-param-string.description: Get or set the URL's search query at key. UrlSearchParamString(url(optional), paramname, replace(optional))

url.name: Url
url.desc: URL to use or empty string to use page's URL.

param.name: ParamName
param.desc: Param key to get or set.
